name: 0_Showcase_Shiny
content:
## You may have to install the "devtools" package.
# install.packages("devtools")


library(devtools)
install_github("zurich-data-scientists/shinyBio")

## Start the app
shinyBio::run_app()


## Alternatively, you can open it by opening the following link:
# https://zurichdatascientistszds.shinyapps.io/shinyBio/
